mapper.select: SELECT sa.id as sa_id,sa.*, sv.id as sv_id,sv.*, skv.sku_id, IF (skv.sku_id IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) AS isChecked FROM spu_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value sv ON sa.sale_attr_id = sv.sale_attr_id AND sa.spu_id = sv.spu_id AND sa.spu_id = #{spuId} LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value skv ON skv.sale_attr_id = sa.sale_attr_id AND skv.sale_attr_value_id = sv.id AND skv.sku_id = #{skuId} order by sa.sale_attr_id
